_xResult.title: Inside or out Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made reversible linen jacket with tasteful fringe detailing
_xResult.longdesc:
Vulnerability is always the most courageous route. How many sides do you have? How many do you show? Be brave enough to show up in this made to measure, artfully crafted linen jacket. The reversible nature allows you to customize your look and the fringe adds a specialized detail that cannot be recreated.

 

Aiste says "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics."

 

Aiste custom made to measure coats fit better and can be customized for length. Have sloping shoulders, or one higher than the other? Let us know and we can make adjustments.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash. Dry clean ok.
